text: Edgar Faure (; 18 August 1908 – 30 March 1988) was a French politician, essayist, historian, and memoirist.Edgar Faure. Encyclopædia Britannica From 1973 to 1978, he was President of the French National Assembly. He was also Prime Minister of France in 1952 and again from 1955 to 1956. ==References== Category:1908 births Category:1988 deaths Category:Prime ministers of France Category:Presidents of the National Assembly (France) Category:Memoirists
title: Edgar Faure
